sub-header-main: Organization of hookah catering at your event in the Republic of Serbia
about-text:
has been around for over 10 years, selling franchises to its partners and opening lounge establishments around the world. Hookah Catering in the Republic of Serbia has been successfully operating for 6 years already, offering the best hookah service in the country.
Today you have the opportunity not only to visit our lounges, but also to use our offsite services. The offer perfectly suits any format of your event, perfectly complementing your rest and the rest of your guests. Our professional approach and experience of our masters will not leave you indifferent.
dignities-title: The main advantages of our service
dignities-html:
• The use of exclusively advanced equipment that meets all current trends and standards
  • Compliance with sanitary regulations
  • An extensive palette of flavors from the best tobacco brands
  • Efficiency and flexibility
  • Masters with experience of 3 years or more
  • Return of hookahs no more than 10 minutes
  • The ability to travel anywhere in the Republic of Serbia
target-title: Customization for any type of event
target-html:
• Corporate parties - Do you know that employees of your company like to spend evenings in the lounge? Delight them at your corporate party by giving them the best hookah service in the country.
  • Weddings - Brighten up your wedding with the most memorable aromas, contributing to one of the most memorable celebrations in your life.
  • Birthdays - You will show sensitivity by ordering our catering for a hookah lover on the upcoming name day.
  • Pre-wedding events - Add a note of variety to your stag / hen party.
  • Festival collaborations - Increase the average bill and the patency of your major festival with our help, covering + one need for visitors to your event.
  • Friendly gatherings - Bring color to your lamp home party using our services in the circle of your friends. Hookah is always a great addition to board game gatherings, making your evening even more enjoyable.
price-people-text: You can get a more detailed offer by contacting us by phone or in social networks
price-company-text: Are you an event organizer or other legal entity interested in our services? We have a special offer for you! Enter your contact details and our manager will contact you shortly.
price-form-text: If you are the organizer of the event, fill out the form or call the number:
price-form-success-request: Your application has been successfully sent, we will contact you shortly
price-form-error-request: An error occurred, please try again later or contact us by phone
